job_tasks.phrase: Integrate ML models into deployable Python applications and microservices using cloud infrastructure.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activity of taking trained ML models and making them part of a larger software system that can be deployed, aligning with building and deploying software applications that incorporate ML.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in and lead design reviews with peers and stakeholders.
job_tasks.justification: This describes a collaborative and leadership activity within the software development process, focusing on the design phase, which falls under technical leadership and collaborative design within software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Review code developed by other developers and provide feedback to ensure the consistent application of team best practices and standards.
job_tasks.justification: This is a standard software engineering practice focused on code quality, consistency, and adherence to standards, directly mapping to code review and ensuring team best practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to system documentation and team knowledge sharing.
job_tasks.justification: This involves creating and maintaining documentation for systems and sharing knowledge within the team, which is explicitly included in the definition of contributing to system documentation and team knowledge sharing.

soft_skills.phrase: Participate in and lead design reviews with peers and stakeholders.
soft_skills.justification: Leading and participating in design reviews with peers and stakeholders directly involves collaboration and communication, fitting the definition of working effectively in a team and sharing knowledge.

soft_skills.phrase: Review code developed by other developers and provide feedback to ensure the consistent application of team best practices and standards.
soft_skills.justification: Providing feedback on code to peers is a form of communication and collaboration aimed at maintaining team standards.

soft_skills.phrase: Contribute to system documentation and team knowledge sharing.
soft_skills.justification: Sharing knowledge within a team is a direct aspect of collaboration and is explicitly mentioned in the definition of this category.

profile.rationale: The job description exclusively lists tasks from Macro-Category A, specifically 1.A.1. Software Development & Integration. These tasks include integrating ML models into applications, leading design reviews, code reviews, and documentation. There are no tasks related to model development, fine-tuning, or specialized AI/ML research (Macro-Category B). This aligns with the AI-Adjacent Software Engineer profile, which focuses on software engineering tasks that integrate AI/ML capabilities into products.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear, concise, and directly maps to the defined categories. All responsibilities are explicitly stated and fall squarely within 1.A.1. Software Development & Integration. The technologies mentioned are also clear. The profile assignment is straightforward based on the absence of Macro-Category B tasks and the clear integration of ML.
